description: Tenzing is an easy-to-use web-based app and R package, that allows researchers to generate reports about the contribution of each team member on a project using CRediT, for insertion into their manuscripts and for publishers to potentially incorporate into article metadata.
title: marton-balazs-kovacs/tenzing: tenzing: documening contributorship with CRediT

creators.affiliation: Department for Research Methods and Experimental Psychology, University of Cologne
creators.name: Frederik Aust
